name: Spotify-Loader
description: Telegram bot to upload spotify playlist/artist/album/track music file to telegram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get this value from https://t.me/BotFather

API_ID.description: Your API ID, as a string. Get this value from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash, as a string. Get this value from https://my.telegram.org

OWNER_IDS.description: Your Telegram ID (can be more than 1 ids, separated by space), not username. Get this value by opening https://t.me/MissRose_bot and send /id to bot. Leave empty if you want bot as public.

MONGO_DB_URL.description: Your Mongo DB URL. Watch: https://youtu.be/0aYrJTfYBHU. You can also leave it empty. but your bot will have just some limited feature.
